1 <?php
2 use duzun\hQuery;

8 // -----------------------------------------------------
9 define('PHPUNIT_DIR', dirname(__FILE__) . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR);
10 define('ROOT_DIR', strtr(dirname(PHPUNIT_DIR), '\\', '/').'/');
11 // define('PHP_IS_NEW', version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.3.0') >= 0);
12 // -----------------------------------------------------
13 if ( !class_exists('PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase') ) {
14  class_alias('PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase', 'PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase');
15 }
16 
17 // -----------------------------------------------------
18 // if ( PHP_IS_NEW ) {
19  require_once ROOT_DIR . 'autoload.php';
20 // }
21 // else {
22 // require_once ROOT_DIR . 'hquery.php';
23 // }
24 // -----------------------------------------------------
25 // -----------------------------------------------------
29 // -----------------------------------------------------
30 abstract class PHPUnit_BaseClass extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
31  public static $log = true;
32  public static $testName;
33  public static $className;
34  // -----------------------------------------------------
35  // Before any test
36  public static function setUpBeforeClass() {
37  parent::setUpBeforeClass();
38  }
39  // After all tests
40  public static function tearDownAfterClass() {
41  parent::tearDownAfterClass();
42  }
43 
44  // -----------------------------------------------------
45  // Before every test
46  public function setUp() {
47  self::$testName = $this->getName();
48  self::$className = get_class($this);
49 
50  parent::setUp();
51  }
52  // -----------------------------------------------------
60  public static function assertMehodExists($methodName, $className, $message = '') {
61  self::assertThat(method_exists($className, $methodName), self::isTrue(), $message);
62  }
63 
64  // Alias to $this->assertMehodExists()
65  public function assertClassHasMethod() {
66  $args = func_get_args();
67  return call_user_func_array(array($this, 'assertMehodExists'), $args);
68  }
69 
70  // -----------------------------------------------------
71  // Helper methods:
72 
73  public static function log() {
74  if ( empty(self::$log) ) return;
75  static $idx = 0;
76  static $lastTest;
77  static $lastClass;
78  if ( $lastTest != self::$testName || $lastClass != self::$className ) {
79  echo PHP_EOL, PHP_EOL, '-> ', self::$className.'::'.self::$testName, ' ()';
80  $lastTest = self::$testName;
81  $lastClass = self::$className;
82  }
83  $args = func_get_args();
84  foreach($args as $k => $v) is_string($v) or is_int($v) or is_float($v) or $args[$k] = var_export($v, true);
85  echo PHP_EOL
86  , ""
87  , str_pad(++$idx, 3, ' ', STR_PAD_LEFT)
88  , ")\t"
89  , implode(' ', $args)
90  , PHP_EOL
91  ;
92  }
93  // -----------------------------------------------------
94  public static function deleteTestData() {
95  }
96  // -----------------------------------------------------
97  public static function file_get_contents($fn) {
98  $ffn = self::file_exists($fn);
99  return $ffn ? file_get_contents($ffn) : false;
100  }
101 
102  public static function file_exists($fn) {
103  $ffn = PHPUNIT_DIR . $fn;
104  if ( !file_exists($ffn) ) {
105  $zfn = $ffn . '.gz';
106  if ( !file_exists($zfn) ) {
107  return false;
108  }
109  $gz = file_get_contents($zfn);
110  $data = hQuery::gzdecode($gz);
111  if ( !file_put_contents($ffn, $data) ) return false;
112  }
113  return $ffn;
114  }
115 
116  public static function fn($fn) {
117  $ret = self::file_exists($fn) or $ret = $fn;
118  return $ret;
119  }
120 
121 
122  // -----------------------------------------------------
123 }
124 // -----------------------------------------------------
125 // Delete the temp test user after all tests have fired
126 register_shutdown_function('PHPUnit_BaseClass::deleteTestData');
127 // -----------------------------------------------------
